page.title: 11OLD PEOPLE'S HOMES
page.content: {FLATS}-2 seperate units,Ashwood House and Park View, containing 79 self-contained flats.Each unit has a resident warden and a cleaner.Warden visits each flat every morning and also does some shopping, collects prescriptions etc.An intercom system connects each flat with warden's flat.Amenities-common room laundry outings concerts etc. Visitors allowed at any time. 1 guest room provided for over-night guests.This is heavily booked.Pets only allowed if residents owned them initially.Provide independent life in a safe environment.{CIRCUIT HOUSE}-20 yrs. old,community centre for citizens age 65-90 who live in nearby flats and bungalows.Many have lived in Woodlands all their lives.
